description:
The right tool for the job does the job right. These high-quality cutters are engineered specifically to use on bike cables and housing, including hard-to-cut index housing.

  • Cold-forged, heat-treated steel handles and jaws for strength
  • Ergonomic rubber handles
  • Precision-ground jaws for a clean cut
  • Built-in crimper for cable end caps, and a forming hole for reforming housing ends and ferrules
  • Wire latch holds handles together in storage
name: Park Tool CN-10 Professional Cable/Housing Cutters
